name: Dragon Tower
description:
Dragon Tower is a fantasy adventure made in sok-stories for the sok-stories jam.

There are four endings to find!

Alternatively, you can play the game here.

Embedded with the unofficial embedding tool.

This game was a lot of firsts for me. This was my first game jam, my first game published to itch.io, and my first experience with sok-stories. You can play the other jam submissions here!

*SPOILERS BEYOND THIS POINT*

The four endings are as follows:

1. Fire - failure

2. Flower - romance

3. Pink potion - fairy

4. Green potion - dragon

Did you...

...break the cage?

...escape through the window?

...amass a great hoard with your loving partner?

...return to pay back the shopkeeper as a dragon?
